name: Walking Taco Recipe
description: This easy walking taco recipe is such a fun way to entertain. They are simple to make + they are oh-so-good for parties, game day and beyond!
ingredients: ¼ packet Hidden Valley Fiesta Ranch Dip optional
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet over medium heat, breaking it up with a masher or base of a wooden spoon and stir in taco seasoning until just brown. Optional: combine ranch mix and sour cream. Fill chip bags for walking tacos with ground beef, shredded cheese, fiesta sour cream and so much more.
